name: DashBar
author: Sebastien Erard

sections.description:
This plugin tries to enable previous feature present in DashBar in the new WordPress Admin Bar.

No more options, only contextual links missing in the admin bar:

  • Choose from the list of posts displayed to edit one

Network admin is also accessible from the first menu

No more localization required as this plugin uses core WordPress text.

WARNING: This plugin requires PHP 5.
sections.installation:
Install from the repository or:

  1. Upload the content of the directory DashBar to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
What the hell, it doesn’t work. What can I do ?

Ther’s a lot of option :
1. You can create an issue on Github
2. Drop me a mail with any relevant data: WordPress version, theme, active plugins… I’ll do my best to fix the issue.
3. If you know PHP and WordPress, You can even submit a patch or fork this project on github.
sections.changelog:
3.0

Integrate DashBar features in WordPress Admin Bar (at least)

2.7.2

Added Belorussian and Japanese translation

short_description: This plugin tries to enable previous feature present in DashBar in the new Wordpress Admin Bar.
description:
This plugin tries to enable previous feature present in DashBar in the new WordPress Admin Bar.

No more options, only contextual links missing in the admin bar:

  • Choose from the list of posts displayed to edit one

Network admin is also accessible from the first menu

No more localization required as this plugin uses core WordPress text.

WARNING: This plugin requires PHP 5.

upgrade_notice.3.0: This version doesn't need any of the previous customizing options, but your options won't be lost: maybe we will use them in a further version. Hence you can remove them manually (if you want) from the database. You just have to remove any DashBar* option in the table.

screenshots.caption: New 'Edit' Menu with an direct edit link from current single page/post.
New 'Edit' Menu with the list of posts or pages from current view.
